name: Sausage Pizza
description: Delicious pizza topped with premium sausage, mozzarella cheese, and our special tomato sauce.

name: Veggie Pizza
description: Fresh vegetables including bell peppers, onions, mushrooms, and olives on our signature crust.

name: Deluxe Pizza
description: The ultimate pizza experience with a combination of premium toppings including pepperoni, sausage, bell peppers, and more.

name: Chicken Pizza
description: A hearty blend of chicken, mushrooms, and cheese on a rich tomato base, perfect for meat lovers.
